title: Rock Star Cowboys: The Honeymoon
description: Destination undisclosed. No Paparazzi. No harassing media or hovering drones. Finally, Connor and Carson get Breezy all to themselves on the honeymoon of lifetime and they aren't about to let a moment go to waste. Author  Rock Star The Honeymoon is a romantic, ten-thousand word lavish epilogue to Rock Star Cowboys and, due to potential spoilers, should not be read as a standalone. Rock Star Cowboys should be read first to fully appreciate this story. The McLendon Family Saga reading The Heart of Falcon Ridge A McLendon Christmas Rock Star Cowboys Rock Star The Honeymoon The Hardest Goodbyes Return to Falcon Ridge Forever Falcon Ride The Legacy of Falcon Ridge
author: D.L. Roan
